column4: hey all, I have a computer running Xubuntu 7.10 with a SATA DVD burner plugged into a SATA to IDE converter, and it refuses to burn, logs at http://pastebin.ca/1006597
ive been having issues with my SATA and IDE burners under  hardy.. but dident have any issues under 7.10 - Odd that you are having issues.  You might want to check the forums.
i've had no problems with burners in the past... i'll have a look
yep. Ive had no issues in the past.. and now - all sorts of issues. :(
